field.name: ctx_retries
field.description: The "ctx_retries" field is used to keep track of how many attempts were made to handle this request. In some cases, the service or transport that handles the request may be down or over capacity and is being retried.

field.name: ctx_app
field.description: The "ctx_app" refers to the application used to make the request. This is different from ctx_ua (user_agent) because the agent used (Safari, Firefox) is not necessarily the app used (cms, iOS app, website)

field.name: ctx_cloud
field.description: The "ctx_cloud" is set by the server making the request and is generally only used internally for tracking and performance monitoring.
